Work

Project Pizza

Built With: Javascript, HTML, CSS

Project Pizza is an app that will search for top rated pizzerias within 25 miles of the user input address. When the submit button is clicked 10 search results are populated on the page with image, pizzeria name, address, and a button for directions. A button is also created in the search history for later use and the data is saved to local storage. Upon clicking the directions button on the search results card a modal is displayed with directions to that pizzeria from the user input address.

Run Buddy

Built With: HTML, CSS

Run Buddy is a webpage to gnerate new clients for a fitness training service. In the header there are 4 links to the 4 sections of the webpage. The hero section of the webpage contains a form to capture user input for new clients. The next section explains what the training service does followed by a section that shows what the potential client will do. Next a section with a brief bio of each trainer. Lastly a section for ways to contact the fitness training service. There is also an webpage with the privacy policy that can be accessed via a link in the footer.

Taskmaster Pro

Built With: Javascript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

Taskmaster Pro is a Kanban style task organizer app. When add task is cicked a form is displayed that captures a brief description of the task and a due date for the task. Once save task is clicked the task appears in the To Do column. The task may then be dragged and dropped into any of the columns or dropped on the delete bar at the bottom of the page. Diffent background colors are used to signify close to do date and past due date.
